Assume no. Of coins they have is a, b,c respectively

a+b+c=7 which a,b,c greater than or equal to 0

We make them each have one first (a,b,c >=1)
(a+1)+(b+1)+(c+1)=10

Therefore we draw 10 coins

o o o o o o o o o o

To chop these 10 coins to 3 we add 2 lines between any 2 of the coins, we have 9 spaces in between

Therefore it is 9C2
